relevance_explanation: The routine includes only steps relevant to this customer, based on their data. All irrelevant branches and tool calls have been correctly removed. For example, the logic related to bookings that do not allow cancellations was removed.
completeness_explanation: The routine is mostly complete but the apology and case completion/termination in step 3b for api_failure and 'any other response' should skip to step 8 to call complete_case() instead of 7.
